title: Future Blues â€“ Emily's Cowboy Bebop Page (1999)
I used Stable Diffusion and Dreambooth to create an art portrait of my dog
dot:
digraph StableDiffusionArtProcess{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box];A[label="Introduction
- Started with Stable Diffusion in Aug 2022
- Challenges in reproducing specific subjects"];B[label="Community Projects
- Emergence of techniques for creative control
- Focus on Dreambooth"];C[label="Dreambooth
- Fine-tuning technique for Stable Diffusion
- Enables consistent images of defined subjects"];D[label="Workflow
- Steps to create art print:
  1. Image Training Set
  2. Train Dreambooth Model
  3. Generate Images
  4. Outpainting
  5. Inpainting
  6. Upscaling
  7. Prepare for Print"];E[label="Image Training Set
- High quality images of subject (e.g., Queso)
- Variety in poses/environments"];F[label="Train Dreambooth Model
- Use Replicate for training
- Script for training parameters"];G[label="Generate Images
- Write prompts
- Use Replicate API to generate images"];H[label="Outpainting
- Extend image boundaries by generating new pixels"];I[label="Inpainting
- Mask out and replace specific image sections"];J[label="Upscaling
- Increase image size for high-quality print"];K[label="Prepare for Print
- Final adjustments in Photoshop
- Print using Epson XP-15000"];A->B;B->C;C->D;D->E;D->F;D->G;D->H;D->I;D->J;D->K;L[label="Final Thoughts
- Excitement for future of Stable Diffusion
- Potential for artists"];K->L;}
